scripts.start-all-service: (cd client && npm run start) & (cd posts && npm run start) & (cd comments && npm run start) & (cd moderation && npm run start) & (cd event-bus && npm run start)
scripts.install-all: (cd client && npm install) & (cd posts && npm install) & (cd comments && npm install) & (cd moderation && npm install) & (cd event-bus && npm install) && (cd query && npm install)
